content.question: The passage is primarily about

choices.label: the author's views on child development
the author's influence on literary tradition
the purpose of the author's cultural studies
the development of the author's vocation

content.answer: the development of the author's vocation

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
